Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/14 3:30PM - Gotta love some free refills to wrap up the weekend! We enjoyed having the Sun Bowl open for the weekend and offering some stellar powder skiing! Unfortunately, the Sun Bowl trails have very little base and we feel it is best to close those trails for the coming week. The good news is that we will be opening Black Bear beginning tomorrow, knowing it can hold up to the lower weekday skier and rider traffic. Additionally, final snowmaking repairs will begin after closing tonight. Stay tuned for more details! 

We are stoked to still be offering well over 339 acres and 62 trails rolling into the coming week. Of which, 48 trails will receive fresh stripes overnight. 7 lifts are set to spin at 9AM with the possibility of wind delays. Snow showers are forecasted to continue throughout Monday while temperatures will dip. Be sure to pack extra layers and keep your face covered. Due to high winds and cold temperatures, beginner skiing and riding is not recommended from the summit. See you on the hill!

Safety Tip: Wear a helmet and dont forget to buckle it. 

Ice Skating is now open! Lace up and head to the Mill House skating pond for a day or night of winter fun. Enjoy music and a campfire all while gliding under the stars. Book now to guarantee your place on the ice.

Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

The Nordic Center is now open for Nordic Skiing and Snowshoeing! Enjoy the peaceful 10km of trails with friends or family.  

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
